messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, I need somebody escorted out of my store right away. He's causing problems.
Okay, is he fighting with people?
Yeah, he's fighting with somebody right now.
Okay, is it a physical fight or verbal?
Verbal.
What is the address we need to come out to?
Holy shit.
What is the address?
What is the address?
He has a gun or a knife.
Okay. Stay on the phone. What's the address?
Okay, okay, okay. The address is 1330 El Paseo de Saratoga.
Now what makes you think he has a gun or a knife?
He just pulled it out.
Okay, but there's a difference. Is it a gun?
There's a gun.
Okay, stay on the phone. Can you go somewhere safe?
Go, go, go, go, go, go. In the bathroom. Go.
Okay, and so this guy... Oh my God, he shot somebody.
Oh my God, oh my God.
Oh my God. Holy shit.
Okay. Are you safe?
Yeah, we're in the bathroom.
Okay, so this guy, is he white, black, Hispanic, or Asian?
White.
How old does he look?
About 40.
Is he tall, short, or medium?
Medium.
Is he heavy, thin, or medium build?
Heavy.
Okay, what is he wearing?
He's wearing a giant sweater and a Giant's hat.
A Giants baseball cap?
Yes.
Okay, stay on the phone with me, okay? I want to get a really good description. I've got units on their way out there right now, okay? You're at Pete's Coffee at 1330 El Paseo de Saratoga?
Yes.
Let me just update this. Did you see somebody get shot, or did you just hear him fire the gun?
Yes, somebody is shot.
Okay. So the guy who shot, is it a male or a female?
I don't know.
Do we have any age or anything like that?
I don't know.

Okay, I don't want you to go out there. I've got units on their way. I want to get a good description of this guy so we catch him, okay? So it's a white male adult. He's about 40 years old with a medium height and heavy build.
Yes.
Do you remember what color hair he has?
Dark short hair under his hat.
Did he come in a car? Do you remember?
No, I don't know.
That's fine. He's inside the store, and he's wearing a Giants baseball cap and a giant sweatshirt, right?
Yes.
Lock the door, please. We've got units in the area, okay? I don't want anybody getting hurt, so if you're in a safe place, I want you to stay there, all right?
Okay. We're in the back room, but he's gone.
He left?
He's gone, but somebody is shot.
Okay. So the person that's shot, is it a male or female?
Male.
How old does he look? Around 20, 30, 40?
I don't know. Oh my God.
Okay, can you shut the door?
The police are here now.
Okay, and what is your name?
My... The officer is here.
Okay, talk to the officer. Thank you for calling.
Thank you so much. Bye.
